definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]

sentences.english: Please stay to the solid rock, fishing will be gone.
sentences.chinese: 請留盤石上，垂釣將已矣。

sentences.english: Songs of Digging Pool played an important role in development of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 《圭塘矣欠乃集》在棹歌發展史佔有重要地位。

sentences.english: The 2 cities have come into Liu Xuande’s possession without the least effort on his part.
sentences.chinese: 二處城池，全不費力，皆屬劉玄德矣。

sentences.english: Let your evinced desires be for what is good, and the people will be good.
Neither shall there be sorrow or dying, neither shall there be any more pain, for.
sentences.chinese: 不再有悲傷和生死離別，不再有痛苦，因往事已矣。
他們的實驗仍然已矣了。

sentences.english: You understand it will be late to counsel them or pray.
sentences.chinese: 那時所有的相勸與祈禱都晚矣。

sentences.english: Lile says that he favors carry on peace pipe.
Now, Yin Gong Tuo is an upright man, and the friends of his selection must be upright also.
sentences.chinese: 夫尹公之他，端人也，其取友必端矣。

sentences.english: "Catchword agriculture " can rest Gao Dengyuan spring answer the earth, everythings on earth anabiosises.
sentences.chinese: “口號農業”可以休矣高登元春回大地，萬物復甦。

sentences.english: Chinoiserie has been influenced western fashion for a long time.
sentences.chinese: “中國風”對西方時裝的影響可謂久矣。

sentences.english: Of course, nothing will bring back those loved ones that families have lost to terror.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對於恐怖襲擊的受害者家庭來說，逝者已矣。

sentences.english: Your body will stop holding water if you drink more water.
Space is curved so I must bend.
The literature, the "carry on" and "its" word interoperability, yet is rarely seen.
sentences.chinese: 但文獻裏，“矣”與“其”字互用，尚爲罕見。

sentences.english: In the great Shun I see the case of one whose desire at fifty year's was towards them.'
sentences.chinese: 五十而慕者，予於大舜見之矣。

definition: equally true for (all the rest)/the same thing applies (for everyone)
